features.feature: 亲爱的用户，本次更新优化了相机和显示体验，增强了系统稳定性，推荐您进行更新。
优化相机在部分场景下的拍照效果。
优化部分主题界面显示效果。
优化系统稳定性，让您的体验更加流畅。
1.本次更新不会删除您的用户数据，但仍建议您在更新前做好数据备份。 2.更多精彩功能介绍，请访问“玩机技巧”应用。 3.如果您在使用过程中遇到任何问题，请访问“我的荣耀”应用或拨打荣耀客服热线400 696 6666寻求支持。
Dear user: this update includes camera, display, and system stability improvements for your device. Applying the update is recommended.
Improved camera performance in certain scenarios.
Effect optimizations in certain UI themes.
System stability tweaks for a smoother experience.

1.Installing this update will not erase your personal data, but we recommend that you back up any important data before proceeding. 2.For more introductions to product features, please visit the "Tips" app. 3.For issues, please visit the "My Honor" app. You can also reach out to Honor customer service at 400-696-6666 for assistance.
